Description: Very small fragment of woollen, multicolour tapestry (grouped warp) with plain weave at one edge; Part of a double band with pink birds and green leaves on a blue background; Warp: S-spun, c.17 tpc; Weft: S-spun, c.21 tpc in plain area, c.55 in tapestry; Edges all ragged.
Curator's comments: Previous location cupboard 64, brown box; Probably from a tunic; Information from Hero-Granger-Taylor (1.11.1989)
Condition: Fair; Unknown date stuck to sticky net
